entities.name: sign
entities.description: The document on which people are putting their signatures. (Excerpt: 'Fred reached out for the parchment and cheerfully put down his signature...')

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge, a person that Harry is trying to keep secrets from. (Excerpt: 'you said yourself, if Umbridge finds out...')

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred, one of the people signing the document. (Excerpt: 'Fred reached out for the parchment and cheerfully put down his signature...')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry, the person who is trying to keep secrets from Umbridge. (Excerpt: 'you said yourself, if Umbridge finds out...')

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie, a prefect who is hesitant to sign the document. (Excerpt: 'But Ernie was looking rather hesitant about signing too.')

entities.name: george
entities.description: George, one of the people signing the document. (Excerpt: 'Fred reached out for the parchment and cheerfully put down his signature...')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione, a prefect who is raising her eyebrows at Ernie's hesitation. (Excerpt: 'But Ernie was looking rather hesitant about signing too.')

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Umbridge finding out about the group. (Excerpt: 'you said yourself, if Umbridge finds out...')

Ernie is also concerned about Umbridge finding out about the group. (Excerpt: 'I — well, we are prefects... And if this list was found . . . well, I mean to say . . . you said yourself, if Umbridge finds out . . .')
Harry reminded Ernie about the importance of the group. (Excerpt: 'You just said this group was the most important thing you’d do this year')
Harry passed a document to George. (Excerpt: 'George was trying to pass him the parchment')
